13.0: "And David danced before HaShem with all his might" - Danced with all his strength and concentration.  And its targum is "praised."

15.1: And she despised him in her heart - When she saw him from the window, she despised him in her heart because she thought it was not honorable for the king to behave in the manner of the common people, even before the ark, and afterwards, when he went to his house, she said directly, "What was honored today..."
